FuncDef: This command defines an external collector node that collects syslog records. The syslog records are streamed to the collector node using UDP transport. Traffic is originated from a random ephemeral UDP port to the destination port 514. Up to two collector nodes can be defined for redundancy purposes.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the router instances from which the collector node is reachable.
Specifies the IPv4 address of the external collector node to which the syslog records are sent.
Specifies the service name from which the collector node is reachable.
Keyword used to create the collector instance.
